text:
@ErinMPerrine @realDonaldTrump Fox “News” is your source for that claim? Seriously? 😆

Meanwhile, in the real world: 

https://t.co/BNufoRgmHC

The majority of Americans know that Trump is a fraud, a liar, a failure, and a criminal. He has never shown anything akin to “leadership,” and he never will.
